availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Born in Grant County, Kentucky, on October 22, 1845.
Son of John J. Landrum and Sarah Ann Eickler Landrum.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 344B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 132

Gravestone says J. Perry Landrum
Find A Grave, "J. Perry Landrum (1844-1912)," Memorial #45776485, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/45776485 (accessed June 14, 2019).
